title: Exploring the Lost City
body: Jenny leads you through the dense jungle, the ruins of an ancient city towering ahead. As you approach, strange symbols on the walls begin to glow faintly. Something feels off... The air is thick with mystery. She turns to you, 'What will you do next?'
summary: The user has decided to explore the lost city, which is shrouded in mystery. Jenny is guiding them through the jungle as they approach the ruins, sensing something strange.
image: A dense jungle with ancient glowing ruins in the background
